articles.title: Paul Sorvino, 'Goodfellas' And 'Law & Order' Actor, Dies At 83
articles.description: In his over 50 years in the entertainment business, Sorvino was a mainstay in films and television.
articles.content: Paul Sorvino arrives at the 29th annual Producers Guild Awards at the Beverly Hilton on Saturday, Jan. 20, 2018, in Beverly Hills, Calif. Sorvino, an imposing actor who specialized in playing crooks … [+1938 chars]

articles.title: 'The Lord of the Rings: Gollum' is delayed a month before launch | Engadget
articles.description: Daedalic Entertainment has delayed The Lord of the Rings: Gollum a little more than five weeks before it was due to debut on September 1st..
articles.content: Daedalic Entertainment has delayed The Lord of the Rings: Gollum a little more than five weeks before it was due to debut on September 1st. The studio took to Twitter on Monday to announce it would n… [+827 chars]

articles.title: Apex Legends' new legend Vantage, Hunted update release date announced
articles.description: Respawn Entertainment revealed Apex Legends' newest character, Vantage (and her pet bat Echo), in an update on the Hunted patch coming to the free-to-play shooter.
articles.content: Vantage and Echo come to Respawns shooter in August
